name: Facecheck
description:
Try to roll the dice to light up all the necessary squaresin this relaxing puzzler?

Controls:
WASD / Arrow Keys: Move
Escape: Open Pause Menu

This Game was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.  Unfortunately I only had one day time to make this, cause I was busy on the other one.  So it may be shorter and less polished than expected. I hope you still enjoy.
